label: A string representing the Neo4j Label
description: A string describing the node type. Optional

requiredProperties.name: A string reprenting the name of the Node's property
requiredProperties.validator: The name of the validator you want to use. The validator must ultimately pass a string, number, or simple array of a string or number to neo4j.
requiredProperties.description: A description of the property. Optional.

validRelations.type: A string representing the type of outbound relation

requiredProperties.name: Property name
requiredProperties.validator: Property validator - same as for node properties
requiredProperties.description: Optional string to describe what this relation type is for
